content.html: happy #internationalpronounsday! üíñ my pronouns are she/her. ‚ú® sharing your pronouns as a cis person is a low bar for allyship. but it does help people feel more comfortable sharing their own, especially if they don‚Äôt conform to the gender binary. so pop yours in your bio!
